AutoTaxonomizer
=====

`AutoTaxonomizer` is a suite of machine learning tools for the automated analysis of aquatic macorinvertebrate communities including the identification, enumeration, and size distribution. Details on navigating the tools and workflows can be found at the [repository webpage](https://jimjunker1.github.io/macro-detect/)
